file.name: sandbox-auth.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Sandbox Auth
  description: |
    This API call generates an access token that can be used in the RTR exchange and C&S API calls for sandbox calls.
    
    # Pre-requisites:
    1. Create an app with the `rtr-sandbox-product` on the [Developer Portal](https://developer.payments.ca/)
    2. Mark down the `Consumer Key` and `Consumer Secret`
    
    # Calling this API on this page
    1. Click the Authorize button.
    2. Fill in the username with your Consumer Key and fill in the password with your Consumer Secret.
    3. Click Authorize
    4. Expand /accesstoken and click "Try it out"
    5. Click "Execute"
    6. In Server Response section, find the `access_token` in their and mark it down. This token will be used in the other APIs calls, this token expires in 5 minutes.
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: "https://api.payments.ca/" 
    description: Sandbox Environment 

paths:
  /accesstoken:
     post:
      summary: Generates an access token
      security:
        - basicAuth: []
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                grant_type: 
                  type: string
                  description: 'Always client_credentials'
                  default: 'client_credentials'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 'Received Token'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TokenResponse'


components:
  securitySchemes:
    basicAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: basic
  schemas:
    TokenResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        refresh_token_expires_in:
          type: string
          example: "0"
        api_product_list:
          type: string
          example: "[rtr-sandbox-product]"
        api_product_list_json:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        organization_name:
          type: string
          example: "Organization Name"
        developer.email:
          type: string
          example: "email@example.com"
        token_type:
          type: string
          example: "Bearer"
        issued_at:
          type: string
          description: Unix timestamp
          example: "1646844617932"
        client_id:
          type: string
          example: "client_id"
        access_token:
          type: string
          example: "access token"
        application_name:
          type: string
          example: "application UUID"
        scope:
          type: string
          example: ""
        expires_in:
          type: string
          example: "1799"
        refresh_count:
          type: string
          example: "0"
        status:
          type: string
          example: approved
